dcterms:creator: N. Moustafa
J. Slay
dcterms:description: Widely in use since 2015 as a dataset for evaluating NIDS, it was created by Cyber Range Lab of UNSW-Canberra. The Dataset contains 49 (excluding class labels) features and a total 2,540,044 records that were split across 4 CSV files. The dataset contains a total of 10 class labels out of which there are 9 types of Botnet attack vectors and 1 Normal class.
dcterms:title: UNSW-NB15 Dataset

dcterms:creator: Nickolaos Koroniotis
Nour Moustafa
Elena Sitnikova
Benjamin Turnbull
dcterms:description: Created by the Cyber Range Lab of UNSW-Canberra in 2019, it includes network and botnet traffic incorporated into a network environment. The Dataset contains 47 features including class label, attack category and attack subcategory. A total of 72 million records of Normal and attack traffic constitute the Dataset.
dcterms:title: Bot-IoT Dataset
